mapper.select: select user_id,user_pw,user_email,user_name,user_nickname, tel,user_authority,profie_img,report_hit,height,DATE_FORMAT(join_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as join_date,gender,age from user where user_id=#{param1};
mapper.update: update user set user_nickname=#{user_nickname}, tel=#{tel}, height=#{height}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, profie_img=#{profie_img} where user_id=#{user_id};
mapper.select: select b.board_num,b.user_id,content,title,total_kcal,recipe_img_file from board b join heart h on b.board_num=h.board_num join recipe_board r on b.board_num=r.board_num where h.user_id=#{param1};

select b.board_num,b.user_id,content,title,total_kcal,recipe_img_file from board b join heart h on b.board_num=h.board_num join recipe_board r on b.board_num=r.board_num where b.board_num=#{param1} and h.user_id=#{param2};
mapper.delete: delete from heart where board_num=${param1} and user_id=#{param2};
mapper.select: select distinct b.board_num,b.title,b.content,p.pt_img_file from board b join PT_group p on b.board_num=p.board_num left join apply_user a on p.board_num=a.board_num where (a.user_id=#{param1} and a.user_state='참여중') or (b.user_id=#{param1} and b.type_num='2') ORDER BY b.board_num DESC limit ${param2.onePageRecord} offset ${param2.offsetIndex};

select count(distinct b.board_num) from board b join PT_group p on b.board_num=p.board_num left join apply_user a on p.board_num=a.board_num where (a.user_id=#{param1} and a.user_state='참여중') or (b.user_id=#{param1} and b.type_num='2');
select count(distinct board_num) from board where user_id=#{param1} and type_num=3;
select count(board_num) from board where user_id=#{param1} and type_num=1 and board_num!=0;
select ur.user_id,ur.train_num,tr.train_title from user_routine ur join training_routine tr on tr.train_num=ur.train_num where ur.user_id=#{param1};
select weight,DATE_FORMAT(write_date,'%y.%m.%d') as write_date_print from weigth where user_id=#{param1} order by write_date desc limit 10;

select utc.user_id,utc.train_year,utc.train_month,round(utc.train_count/60) as train_count,utc.module_title,utc.write_date from user_training_count utc where utc.user_id=#{param1} and utc.train_year=#{param2};
